content:
Scenario: Family leave policies support care during critical periods
    Given Sarah may need time for childbirth, child illness, parent care, family emergencies
    And traditional leave policies are inadequate
    When family care needs arise
    Then workplace should provide adequate paid family leave
    And leave should not require Sarah to sacrifice career advancement
    And the workplace_elohim should coordinate leave with care needs
    And family leave should be dignified and sufficient
    And policies should recognize care emergencies are inevitable
